name: Joe X
description:
Play it online for free

In a world where zombies, robo-saurs and ninja gangs wreak havoc, there is only one hero who can save humanity. Saving humanity, yep, that's your job. 

How you ask? Your choice, The arsenal is big enough! Fight waves of enemies and pull off spectacular combos to beat the high score.

What's this all about?

We are Blair and Dario and we've been working together on Specter for quite some time. We wanted to do something different for Christmas and that's where Joe X started.

The game is still missing a lot of stuff, but the basic concepts are in. You're very welcome to give us feedback on Twitter!
